entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
